Utilities.name: help
Utilities.description: Get a list of available commands and their functions

Utilities.name: userinfo
Utilities.description: Get information about a certain member in the server

Utilities.name: imgur
Utilities.description: Search for an image on Imgur

Utilities.name: urban
Utilities.description: Get a definition of a word

Utilities.name: covid
Utilities.description: Get Covid-19 stats of a country or the world

Utilities.name: invite
Utilities.description: Invite the bot to your server

Utilities.name: ping
Utilities.description: Get the bot's response time in milliseconds

Admin.name: setup
Admin.description: Run the bot's setup process to more easily personalize it to your liking

Admin.name: settings
Admin.description: Get a list of or change the bot's settings

Admin.name: embed
Admin.description: Create beautiful message embeds with the embed creator

Admin.name: muteall
Admin.description: Mute everyone except yourself in the voice channel you're in

Admin.name: unmuteall
Admin.description: Unmute everyone in the voice channel you're in

Admin.name: moveall
Admin.description: Move everyone in a voice channel to a different channel of your choice

Admin.name: disable
Admin.description: Disable a certain command or group of commands

Admin.name: enable
Admin.description: Enable a certain command or group of commands

Admin.name: disabled
Admin.description: Get a list of all the disabled commands in the server

Admin.name: simulate
Admin.description: Simluate server events to test the bot's actions, such as simulating when a member joins

Moderation.name: warns
Moderation.description: Get a list of a member's warns

Moderation.name: clear
Moderation.description: Delete a certain amount of messages

Leveling.name: rank
Leveling.description: Get the level and rank of a member

Leveling.name: leaderboard
Leveling.description: Get a list of the top 10 members in the server

Leveling.name: addxp
Leveling.description: Add xp to a member (requries admin)

Leveling.name: removexp
Leveling.description: Remove xp from a member (requries admin)

Birthdays.name: birthday
Birthdays.description: View your or another member's birthdays

Birthdays.name: upcomingbirthdays
Birthdays.description: Get a list of the 10 next upcoming birthdays
